author: shahnazvawda
title: Vawdas south africa
text: westridge hotel london what a fabulous hotel ideally situated and the Best feature of this hotel is the Staff on the Ball with great customer attitude made us feel special and at home from Day 1 and the restaurant brilliant accommodated us ... took time and trouble to listen to our request and went out of their way to please us thank you ❣ a special thanks to Mr Amarjot Singh so kind and going the xtra miles to help us ❣ and Big thank you to Marusya Ornella Barbara Paula & Iouut all beautiful professional people made our stay comfortable ❣ Vawdas south africa
